channel.title: Need help with portals
channel.description: i want to add some portals to my server and the only tut i found was not helpful at all so can some1 plz tell me how to add portals

item.title: Need help with portals
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Search global objects in your client.java till you see stuff like:

makeGlobalObject(2842, 9814, 409, 3, 10);

The 2842 is the X coord of where you want to put it
The 9814 is the Y coord of where you want to put it
the 409 is the object which u need to find the portal object ID yourself

Then u have to make a case, in the case you would make a case 409:

And then you would have to declare where it would be teleporting you. Figure that part out yourself iâ€™m not just going to give you a full tutorial on it : )

Read full topic
